import React from'react';import'./testimonials.css';import{Data}from'./Data';// Import Swiper React components
import{Swiper,SwiperSlide}from'swiper/react';// Import Swiper styles
import'swiper/css';import'swiper/css/pagination';// import required modules
import{Pagination}from'swiper/modules';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Testimonials=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/ /* testimonials-section */_jsxs("section",{className:"testimonials section",id:"testimonials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"section__title",children:"My clients say"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"section__subtitle",children:"Testimonials"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Swiper,{className:"testimonials__container container",loop:true,grabCursor:true,spaceBetween:24,pagination:{clickable:true},breakpoints:{576:{slidesPerView:2},768:{slidesPerView:2,spaceBetween:48}},modules:[Pagination],children:Data.map(_ref=>{let{id,image,name,description}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/ /* testimonials-card */_jsxs(SwiperSlide,{className:"testimonials__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"testimonials__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"testimonials__name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"testimonials__description",children:description})]},id);})})]});};export default Testimonials;
